title: Ibn Sirin's Interpretations of Seeing a Chest in a Dream

preview.html:
html

Interpreting seeing a wardrobe in a dream Is the dream of a wardrobe connected to the dreamer's secrets and life in reality? What are the most accurate indicators and interpretations that those responsible for seeing the wardrobe open and closed in a dream provide? Does the metal it was made of hold any noteworthy clues? Learn about the secrets of this vision through the following lines.

Do you have a confusing dream? What are you waiting for; Google, an Egyptian website for dream interpretation

Vault in a dream

The most important things said about interpreting the dream about the wardrobe can be summarized in these points:

  • Seeing a vault in a dream shows the dreamer's life and secrets and privacy in it. The dreamer and knowing the most important secret to keep from others.
  • Seeing a new vault in a dream indicates a new life and happy days that the dreamer will enjoy in the near future, provided the vault is beautiful and solid.
  • If the married dreamer sees that his wardrobe has fallen in a dream, this scene is a sign of bad luck and is interpreted as falling into crises and many problems with his wife or family members in general.
  • If the fortune teller sees the vault that he uses to save money , has fallen in a dream and broken, this indicates poverty, financial decline and falling into many debts.
  • If the dreamer sees that his wardrobe is full of new clothes that are expensive, then the vision foreshadows a lot of money , a happy life, enjoying privacy and stability, and the bachelor, if he sees this vision, becomes a husband and head. for the family in reality.
  • The metal from which this vault is made indicates many meanings. Whoever sees that his vault is made of diamonds will live like kings and enjoy money, prestige and power.
  • But if the dreamer sees his vault made of cheap and weak metal, he will live poor and sad in his life.
  • The iron vault in a dream shows physical strength and also shows the strength of the relationship between the dreamer and his family members.

The vault in a dream for Ibn Sirin

  • Ibn Sirin said: The stable and strong vault in a dream is interpreted as stability, and any damage that befalls the vault in a dream is interpreted as damage that befalls the dreamer and makes him sad and miserable and unstable.
  • If the clothes in the wardrobe are clean and beautiful, this means that the fortune teller is an organized person and his life proceeds within certain controls and rules that he does not deviate from.
  • But if the clothes that the dreamer saw in the wardrobe were old and bad, this indicates difficult days and many crises.
  • The chaotic wardrobe in a dream indicates chaos and randomness, as the dreamer faces many losses and his life deteriorates, because he is an unorganized person in reality.

Wardrobe in a dream for a single woman

Interpreting a dream about a wardrobe for single womenindicates several concepts depending on the type of wardrobe and what things are inside it?:

  • Check out a wardrobe full of clothes: It indicates marriage or a lot of good and abundant money .
  • See a wardrobe full of books: It is interpreted as success and obtaining honorary academic titles, and this interpretation is specific to the girl who studies and is interested in education in reality.
  • Dreaming of a wardrobe full of gold jewelry: By completing the marriageand The dreamer also marries a man who enjoys a good position.
  • Check out the new chest: It indicates a new job or a new partnership, as the new vault or wheel means happy days in the dreamer's life.
  • Seeing the chest market with a familiar face: It indicates the existence of a love relationship between the dreamer and this person, but if she bought a new wardrobe with an unknown young man, the vision is interpreted as love and marriage to a young man whom she will meet in the near future, and the scene. may indicate joint work between the two parties and an increase in profits.
  • See the sale of the old chest: It indicates the passing of pain and the end of harsh memories and the beginning of a positive and happy life.
  • Check out the big chest: And it indicates prosperity and abundance of money if the wardrobe is filled with money and new clothes , and the vision may indicate worries and sorrows if this wardrobe is full of torn clothes and their foul smell.
  • Check out the small chest: And it indicates the conclusion of a love story and marriage to a young man who is not well, even if the small wardrobe contains dirty clothes, this is a sign of problems and fears that are not many and therefore do not severely affect the life of the fortune teller.

Interpreting a dream of opening a wardrobe for a single woman

  • If the dreamer easily opened the wardrobe in a dream, then it will not be difficult to escape his worries and problems, as the dream shows achieving the goal and achieving aspirations easily.
  • If the unmarried woman sees that she opened the wardrobe and found it full of different types and colors of clothes, and all of them are new clothes and their price is high, this dream is a good indication of an increase in sustenance and abundance of money, as the vision suggests hiding.
  • But if the dreamer opened the wardrobe and found a scorpion or snake in it, this is a bad sign, as her enemies have become closer to her than anyone else, so she must be careful and cautious and put obstacles in their way. dealings with others in reality.

Wardrobe in a dream for a married woman

  • If a married woman dreamed that her wardrobe contained clean and elegant clothes, this is a sign of her stability in her home, as she finds safety and happiness beside her husband in reality.
  • If the dreamer sees in a dream that the kitchen cupboard is full of oil and ghee, then this is a lot of sustenance from God Almighty upon you.
  • When a married woman dreams of a children's wardrobe in her private room, knowing that she has no offspring in reality, then the dream tells her that God's mercy is vast and He will bless her with pregnancy and the birth of many children.
  • If the woman sees that her room has two wardrobes, one is hers and the other is for a stranger , but it was mentioned in the dream that this woman is the wife of the dreamer's husband, this is a sign that the dreamer's husband is married to another woman and he is awake.

Wardrobe in a dream for a pregnant woman

  • If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that her wardrobe is full of baby girl clothes, this indicates the birth of a girl .
  • But if the pregnant woman sees that her wardrobe is full of baby boy clothes, this indicates the birth of a boy .
  • And if the pregnant woman sees baby clothes stained with blood in her wardrobe in her dream, this means that her pregnancy is difficult and will not last and unfortunately the fetus may die soon, God willing.
  • If the pregnant woman sees a wardrobe in a dream that was in bad condition and her clothes were torn, this means that she is going through difficult times dominated by poverty, need, and marital strife, and sometimes the vision indicates difficulty. pregnancy and childbirth that is difficult.

title: What is Ibn Sirin's interpretation of a dream about a strange man for a single woman?

preview.text:
The interpretation of a dream of a stranger for a single woman.
There are no fixed interpretations in the world of dreams, as interpretations usually differ and vary according to the visible evidence, just as the vision can be good or bad according to the social status of the viewer and the circumstances he is going through in reality. We will explain through this article all the sayings of the greatest jurists and interpreters about seeing a stranger in the dream of an unmarried girl.
Interpretation of a dream of a stranger for a single woman
Experts in interpretation have confirmed that the appearance of this stranger whom the unmarried woman sees in her dream, and the state in which he appears, whether he is happy or sad, are important matters in clarifying the interpretations of the dream. Seeing a stylish and handsome man proves her happy life full of joy and good luck, and it can herald the arrival of good events and she will soon gain a lot of good.
If this man appears in doubt, and seems miserable and sad, this is a sign of her distress and her bad circumstances during this period, and there is a possibility that she will lose something she loves or that she will be separated from some of her relatives or friends, while if he gave her something in her dream, it was good news that she would be compensated for what happened to her in the past and God would bless her with happiness and peace of mind.
Interpretation of a dream of a stranger for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin
The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a stranger in the dream of a single woman includes many interpretations that were in her favor or warned her against evil in some cases. If the unmarried woman sees a stranger in her dream and he is handsome and happy, then this is a sign of good and that she will marry a righteous man, and he will be a source of happiness and stability in her life, and there will be many things in common between them, and therefore their life will be characterized by peace and stability, and God knows best.
However, if the wise woman has witnessed a heated debate between her and this stranger, then this is considered evidence of the existence of many difficulties and obstacles that prevent her from achieving her aspirations and goals that she has tried hard to achieve but has not succeeded. She has enough luck and skills to achieve them, and this often leads to her going through a period of despair, frustration, and loss of self-confidence.
Interpretation of a dream of a stranger kissing a single woman
A strange kiss on an unmarried girl indicates that her circumstances will calm down and she will get what she wants in the coming days, because wealth will smile upon her and the circumstances will be arranged in her favor and her financial level will improve. Notably, if she sees that her manager at work is the one who kisses her, this is evidence of her promotion and the achievement of the desired reward soon.
But if the kiss was forced and this man was able to control the girl in the dream and harm her, the evidence was not promising, but rather led to situations and judgments and forced her to make decisions and choices in life that do not suit her. But if she was able to escape from him, it seems good, and the arrival of relief and happiness after a long period of misery and suffering, and God knows best.
Interpretation of a dream of a handsome stranger for a single woman
Most interpreters agreed that seeing a handsome man in the dream of a single woman indicates good, abundance of living, and achieving what she wants from goals and desires. It is also a sign of joy and psychological stability.
If the girl is struggling in the training phase she is going through in her real life, the dream predicts the ease of the upcoming exams and her ability to pass them with excellence, and if she has passed the training stages, she is about to join her dream job and get the material gains and moral appreciation she deserves, for her many skills and her insistence on hard work and diligence.
Interpretation of a dream of a stranger in the house for single women
The interpretations of seeing an unknown man inside the house for an unmarried woman depend on the appearance of this person and his characteristics, which means that seeing him happy and smiling means that the woman will soon hear good news and that the news may concern her or relate to one of her family members, and the dream is also evidence of material progress and ability.
Seeing the strange man sad and worried or helpless and sick is one of the disturbing visions that bring unfavorable interpretations, as it indicates the appearance of problems between her family members and the existence of an atmosphere of disagreements and the absence of comfort and reassurance from them. The dream proves that the difficulties and crises will disappear and that they have a lot of pressure and responsibility that they cannot bear, but he will be able to overcome it soon, so he must be patient and endure.
Interpretation of a dream of a strange old man
If the unmarried woman sees the old man in her dream, this may be a reflection of her loneliness and her need for someone close to her who guides her on the right path and protects her from mistakes. The old man is also considered a symbol of the appearance of many changes in the dreamer's life, and it often has a positive impact on her, and she will see many successes and achievements in the next stage by the will of God.
As interpreters said, seeing the old man is evidence that she is wise and reasonable in her actions and that she takes matters seriously, which makes her a leadership figure that people trust her opinions and decisions. On the emotional side, there is a possibility that she will marry a devout young man of high morals and wisdom, and God knows best.
Interpretation of a dream of a stranger who loves a single woman
The interpretation of seeing someone I do not know and who is fond of me in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her engagement or imminent marriage to a young man who loves her and wants to be associated with her, but he does not know this matter. The vision also proves her good morals and good qualities that make her a distinguished personality and enjoy a fragrant reputation among people, but if she is actually engaged, she should know that this relationship is successful and that the marriage will continue because there is love and understanding between them.
The more handsome and stylish this unknown young man is, the more it indicates the girl's organized and coordinated life, her ability to bear responsibility, and her success in achieving what she aspires to. She is also surrounded by a group of good friends who represent support and support for her.
Interpretation of seeing a Korean in a dream for a single woman
Seeing a Korean man in the dream of an unmarried woman is evidence that she will go through many exciting events in the coming period and that she will witness many positive changes that will benefit her whether academically or practically. It is also a symbol of successful work and huge material gains that will make him ...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead bird according to Ibn Sirin

preview.text: Seeing a dead bird in a dream means spending money and other interpretations, so we will interpret it for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a man, like a dead nightingale in a dream, or having a dead bird in the house, or a dead yellow bird, or the death of a blue bird by Ibn Sirin, and more: The interpretation of a dead bird in a dream. Seeing a dead bird in a dream. This vision shows you the bad news that will come to you, and whoever sees the dead bird, this is a sign that money has gone out of your hands and that a lot of money is spent in the wrong place or on trivial matters. And seeing a dead bird rising and flying again means that you will go to another country and this means that you will get rid of your enemies. Seeing a dead bird in a dream means that people want to prevent some things that you want, and sometimes this vision shows sadness and impending fears, but if you see a dead bird flying, then it shows the new beginnings that you will find in your life. And seeing a large number of dead birds in a dream shows the strength that you will gain and an increase in your livelihood, but after a long period of work. A dream of a dead bird is a symbol of resentment, sadness, failure and despair. The end of a bird's life may indicate the end of some important birds. In addition, the death of the bird means changes and transformations. Beautiful birds bring us hope and joy, they fly around singing and whistling, so of course their death means the end of all that joy, and it can indicate the death of hope and joy, and it can also indicate the arrival of dull and sad times in the future. One can say that birds are a symbol of love, faith and loyalty, and their death can symbolize betrayal, distrust and lack of trust in your loved ones. In addition, the death of the bird can be a symbol of the villains in your environment, and if you see birds dying around you, it may mean that the place is not suitable for you to live. Seeing a notorious bird, such as a crow or an owl dead in a dream, means that its owner will reach the position he wants after a short period, and also indicates that the source of livelihood of the owner of this vision will increase. And anyone who sees a dead bird falling from the sky in a dream can experience this dream to draw your attention to more important things in your life, and the dead bird in this dream represents something big in your life that you can't notice. Now, this dream tells you that there is something in your life that you need to take care of and give it time and attention. If you see a bird dying in your dream, this dream is a sign that you need to hurry up and get things done, and this dream indicates that time is running out to fix something and you need to act quickly if you want to avoid any damage. The interpretation of dead birds in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing dead birds in a dream is a negative vision, and anyone who sees dead birds can bring you bad luck, in addition to the fact that this dream may be a warning of impending disaster. Similarly, the dead bird in your dream can be a symbol of resurrection, renewal, change of attitudes, change of people or places, etc. And the death of a bird in a dream can be a sign of old habits, attitudes or bad habits that you have left behind to become a better person, and seeing a dead bird is a sign of bad luck and despair in your future. In addition, dead birds in a dream can be considered a positive symbol, because death is a fact of life, and when one life ends, another begins, so it is possible that a dream of a dead bird indicates the end of something and you may lose someone, but you will meet another person, and you may lose a job, but you will find a new job. In addition, the dead bird can be considered as a sign of the difficult times to come, and as an indication that you must prepare well and pay attention to what awaits us in the future. The interpretation of a dead bird in a dream. Scholars and interpreters said that seeing the death of a bird or a dead bird in a dream indicates a lack of conscience, hatred and malice. Seeing a dead bird in a dream symbolizes a heartless person with a dead conscience. Seeing the death of a bird in a dream shows the bad morals of a person and elements of selfishness and doing everything to get what they want. Some of the meanings of seeing a dead bird in a dream are not performing worship and not mastering work. Also, the death of a bird in the dream of a pregnant woman indicates the death of the child and miscarriage. Since birds are a symbol of productivity, despite their small size, these birds work hard and are highly energetic and always rely on themselves and their loved ones. In this sense, the death of a bird can be a symbol of the loss of efficiency and productivity. In addition, these birds represent a symbol of teamwork and cooperation, so their death can also indicate that you are not an active member of society. And if you are working on a group project, this may be a sign that your team members are dissatisfied with the effort you have put in. If you want to have the right relationship with your team and motivate them to do their best, you need to go the extra mile. The interpretation of a dead nightingale in a dream. A dead nightingale in a dream is one of the undesirable things that indicate the occurrence of a disaster and many problems and obstacles for the vision. If the dead nightingale is seen in a dream, this indicates poverty and lost opportunities, and the death of the nightingale in a merchant's dream warns him that he will lose his business. Seeing a dead nightingale in a single woman's dream is a sign of illness and loss of something important that she wanted. The death of the nightingale in a dream indicates that she faces difficulties and obstacles in the life of an unmarried girl. Dreaming of the death of a nightingale indicates undesirable things, and indicates the end of stability and the beginning of a stage of confusion and discomfort. The death of a nightingale in a dream may indicate disagreements in the dreamer's life with people close to him, which may lead to separation from them. When you see the death of a nightingale in a married woman's dream, this dream is a sign of many worries, sadness and living alone. The interpretation of a dead blue bird in a dream. Seeing a dead blue bird in a dream means disappointment and dissatisfaction, but it also shows bitterness for a person who no longer depends on us suddenly. Also, seeing the death of a blue bird in a dream means that you are preventing others from becoming independent and shows the person who does not want others to be more free than him. An empty cage or a cage with a dead blue bird in a dream expresses his disappointment. The interpretation of a dead yellow bird in a dream. Seeing a dead yellow bird in a dream expresses getting rid of someone who was causing you trouble or indicates the end of a useless friendship or the end of an unfinished task due to illness or a solution...

title: Interpretation of a dream about baldness according to Ibn Sirin

preview.text: Seeing baldness in a dream means happy changes and other interpretations, and we will explain that for single women, married women, pregnant women, divorced women, such as seeing a bald person or someone who saw that they were bald, or a girl or a bald person, or hair loss from the head of Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq, and its details after that in detail. The topic below: Interpretation of baldness in a dream Seeing baldness in a dream It indicates good and can indicate bad, depending on the nature of the dream or its circumstance, so if a person sees baldness in a dream, it may mean that he will lose his money and wealth. As for those who dream that they are bald and have no hair on their head, this is a warning to the fortune teller that he must be wary of his money because it is in danger and he must act wisely with the intention of preserving his capital, as the vision indicates that the dreamer may be exposed to an event that loses his respect in front of others. If you see a man with a bald head, this indicates that fraudsters will make a deal against your interests, but if you stay alert, you will overcome their brilliance and cunning. But if a man dreams of a bald woman, this confirms that he will marry a quarrelsome and cunning woman. If a man sees a bald or hairless woman in a dream, this may indicate a woman who ignores the rights of her home and husband. And if the girl dreams of a bald man, this is a warning from the person who will propose to her, as the vision indicates that he will be an inappropriate person for her and will be inappropriate, so she should. Be careful in giving your consent and reconsider the matter. If the girl sees a bald man in a dream, this may indicate concern for the matters of life. A bald child in a dream symbolizes a happy home, a loving partner and obedient children. Whoever sees that there is no hair on his head and is bald indicates an increase in life and an abundance of blessings, but at the same time the vision indicates an increase in greed and envy. Seeing a bald person in a dream means that this vision shows the problems of life that the dreamer may face. was a girl, this means that she will try to deal with situations on her own and try to control others and confiscate their opinions. As for those who see themselves bald in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will live a happy and happy life, but he will lose it in a second due to the occurrence of an undesirable event. The dreamer's hair loss means that he will spend the rest of his life in great problems and sorrows and hear bad news about the family and also lose his position at work. And if a person sees that he is bald and has no hair in some cases, this may be an indication of an improvement in his life and a sign of good for him in general, provided that his head is not ugly in shape or unacceptable. Interpretation of baldness in a dream for al-Nabulsi Whoever sees in a dream that he is bald fears that his money will go and his prestige will be lowered in the eyes of people. Whoever sees baldness indicates his relationship to sadness. Whoever dreams that he is bald, a part of his master's capital has gone, and he suffers from a lack of authority or power, and it is said that if the dreamer is a debtor, he has paid his debt. And whoever dreams that he is bald, he asks for his master's money and does not benefit from it, and he only takes trouble from it, and harm with the tear indicates harm to money and disease. Interpretation of hair in a dream for Ibn Sirin To begin with, we mention in the introduction of our interpretation the meaning and meaning of seeing hair in a dream, as all interpreters, led by Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, agreed that seeing hair in a dream means money or life, as this money increases and life extends if the hair is long, but hair is short or falls out, the vision shows a loss of money and life, and it is said that it is a sign of approaching the term. And if he sees that his hair is growing, this may mean that his life will increase. As for those who see their hair curly in a dream, this may mean that they will be compensated for the lost money. Interpretation of baldness in a dream for Ibn Sirin Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, mentions that seeing hair loss in a dream or baldness in general may indicate the worries, misfortunes and distress that befall the dreamer in real life, whether male or female, but the affliction intensifies. And the anxiety increases if the dreamer is a woman. His head is bald and has no hair, then in his eyes something of two things. If this baldness is partial and does not include the whole head, then this vision indicates that the dreamer has lost some money in his wake, especially if he is a man of money. But if baldness has grown, then all the hair has grown and the head is free of it. And baldness, this vision can indicate poverty and the loss of all money and its sources in his wake, whether the dreamer is a man or a woman. Some commentators said that seeing baldness in a dream may indicate a loss of prestige and high status in reality. , and this loss usually depends on the amount of baldness on the head, and the same thing happens. The dream, the vision shows that there are some people who are weaving some evils to harm the dreamer in waking life and he should pay attention to them before it is too late. Unlike what was mentioned in our previous discussion, seeing baldness in a dream can be a sign of good and comfort for the dreamer in his real life. A man who sees in his dream that he is bald or a woman who sees in her dream that she is bald, their visions may indicate comfort, improvement in the situation, and the removal of worry and anxiety, especially if one of them is suffering from anxiety and is in real life. Interpretation of baldness in a dream for Ibn Shaheen Interpretation of baldness in a dream for Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen says: If a person dreams in a dream that his hair is falling out and he is becoming bald, this indicates recovery from illness, removal of worries and elimination of the problems that the dreamer is suffering from. If a person dreams that he sees his hair falling out and his coarse hair growing, this is evidence that problems will arise in the dreamer's life and that he will commit some things that will lead him to fall into many problems, and if the person dreams of that. A side of his hair falls out while the other side remains, indicating the dreamer's oppression of women. If a woman dreams that she is shaving her hair or that she has become bald, this is an unfavorable vision and evidence that the dreamer will face some problems, problems, and bad news about the death of the dreamer's husband or one of her relatives and relatives of her relatives .. evidence of the pregnant woman's suffering from worries and crises and evidence of her inability to bear them. And if a girl dreams in her dream ...

title: Interpretation of being late in a dream, being late for work, or being late for exams in a dream.

preview.text: Seeing yourself late in a dream indicates anxiety and other dreams, such as being late for work, university, a wedding, or missing a flight. The interpretation of being late in a dream Seeing yourself late in a dream indicates that the dreamer has lost value and status in society, and indicates that he has made some mistakes, and is losing the respect of people and destroying their love for him. Thus, the dream indicates the dreamer's sadness, weakness, and moral collapse, and indicates entering into depression, and sometimes indicates the presence of an unreliable person. Being late in a dream indicates that the dreamer is a person whom others do not trust and do not trust his words, and that he is a cheater or a scammer. It also indicates the contradiction between a person's words and deeds, and does not fulfill his promise to those who expect it from him and do not think about their sorrow. If you see yourself late in your dream, it means that you will be disappointed, and this dream shows a person who does not have a personality. Whoever sees himself late in a dream, it means that he leaves the matter halfway and does not complete it, and indicates that the dreamer will meet someone who will make his efforts go in vain. This person can work on taking advantage of the dreamer, and can make him lose his hopes and his confidence will not be there in himself, and this dream indicates that one will suffer a lot of harm. Being late in a dream indicates failure, negligence, and wrong momentary actions, and indicates a contradiction between what he says and what he does, and thus people may lose trust in him, as it indicates that he is acting in an irresponsible manner and thus may lose what he had. To read a detailed interpretation of the dream in which you were late, you can do so from the link >> The interpretation of being late in a dream. Interpretation of being late for an appointment in a dream Seeing that you are late for an appointment in a dream means that you spend a lot of money because of someone, and this means that the dreamer will leave the work he is doing in the middle without completing it, and the person will lose his great wealth. Because of this bad experience, he may suffer from a moral collapse. Interpretation of the bus being late in a dream Dreaming that you are late for a bus or bus indicates some important work that he will leave behind and will do some bad behavior and neglect the possibilities that he used to get money from, and unfortunately, he will not be able to use these possibilities again and they may fail. Interpretation of being late for work in a dream Seeing a person late for work in a dream represents the loss of work and gains due to some words, tricks, slander, and corruption that the person has done. It also indicates that those who stand beside the person and protect him will experience great disappointment. Seeing a person late for work in a dream represents a person's lack of knowledge of the value of the opportunities that he gets, and the individual's failure to evaluate them correctly. It also shows that the person does not think about his future, but only thinks about his present, and this dream means that the dreamer also acts selfishly. Interpretation of being late for school in a dream Seeing a person late for school in a dream indicates the person's irrationality, and as a result, the person may not reach his dreams despite being close to them, and he will regret it later after realizing the importance of the situation. But if he was able to make up for the delay and arrived on time, then this expresses the wonderful participation that he will get, which can be related to work, but also to his private life. Interpretation of delaying marriage in a dream Seeing marriage delayed in a dream represents failure to fulfill promises and shows sadness and misery of some people because of it. Interpretation of being late for exams in a dream Being late for exams in a dream often indicates that the time has passed for critical or life issues, such as starting a family or achieving a life project. Being late for exams, for example, may indicate failure to buy a house or make progress in work towards a successful future. It is possible that the dream of being late for the exam is a result of the student being affected by the exam period he is going through and causing him tension. The dream of being late for the exam indicates the person's sadness and feeling of oppression due to his desire to succeed in a job, but he failed, and in time he will realize how bad and bad that job was for him, and he will thank God Almighty. God is great because it didn't happen. And if you want, you can read a detailed interpretation of the dream of being late for exams from the link >> Interpretation of being late for exams in a dream Interpretation of being late for work in a dream The dream of being late for work indicates the person's neglect of his duties and responsibilities and their accumulation on him endlessly, and this dream is a warning of excessive procrastination and slowness in implementing them. Being late for work in a dream may indicate that the dreamer has been late in his real life after the age of marriage, but at the same time, this dream indicates positive energy and motivation and that the dreamer must work on compensating for the years that have not been answered. . title: Ibn Sirin's Interpretation of Dreams About Searching for Missing People

preview.text: To see someone searching for someone in a dream means fear, loss of security, and other concepts that we will mention for single, married, pregnant and divorced women for a man, such as dreaming about the disappearance of a person or the loss of a person he loves, or someone searching for me, or seeing a missing person by Ibn Sirin, and others in continuation of the topic: Searching for a missing person in a dream Searching for a missing person in a dream indicates that the dreamer will live in a state of instability and instability, and if you see that you are searching for a missing person, this indicates serious psychological problems due to difficult social circumstances. Sometimes the unmarried girl sees as if she is searching for her fiancé, and this shows her fears of losing him, and the married woman may see that she is searching for her husband, and this indicates a lack of compatibility between them in the current or recent period. And the divorced woman can be seen as if she is searching for her ex-husband, and this indicates her desire to return or return to him. Seeing the search for a missing person in a dream precedes the feeling of disappearance or loss of that person, and the dream is usually associated with a close person who may be the father or son. The mother, sister or wife may be what makes the seer feel sometimes very afraid during his vision in his dream as if he was losing a member of his family. The interpretation of this dream essentially goes to the emotional side, where the dreamer fears for himself the loss of the most important people, and the reason may be social when the dreamer complains of slander or distance from people, and tries through his subconscious to cause severe pain when the subconscious mind portrays the process of loss and search for him, especially the arduous and exhausting search in strange, barren and sometimes frightening places. Searching for a missing person in Ibn Sirin's dream The interpreter of dreams, Muhammad ibn Sirin, states that seeing the search for any close or strange person, this vision shows some things and may indicate to some people the existence of an emotional curve or an emotional problem. And sometimes it shows some people that they are afraid of something. Sometimes it indicates a lack of attention from those around you, and sometimes it shows the bad psychological state of another person. Sometimes it indicates fear of losing something important, and sometimes it shows that it is self-talk, meaning that it is not a logical vision. Seeing the search for a human being and finding that vision in a dream is praiseworthy, and this vision indicates more than one meaning, it indicates the removal of worries, an indication of overcoming hardships, and an indication of the return of the absent. And it indicates the return of the traveler whose news has been cut off. If you are looking for someone and find in a dream whether there is someone close to you or known to you, then this vision clarifies the extent of that person's concern for you. As for searching for a stranger in a dream, and unfortunately, this vision indicates an injury or some problems. By seeing that people are searching for you throughout the dream and did not find you, this vision indicates that you are actually running away from a problem or problem that you do not want to face, and unfortunately you do not have the ability to deal with this problem. And if you see that you are looking for you and you are hiding in the vision on purpose, then this vision means that you will suffer from a problem and will not escape from it, because you are already able to deal with it. Seeing the disappearance of a person in a dream and the search for him continues in the vision, and this vision indicates that you will care about this person in reality if the missing person is someone you know. And searching for someone in a dream means that the person in reality may need someone to help him or needs something else that you should do for him. Seeing the search for lost valuables, this vision shows the loss of good opportunities that come to him in real life, and sometimes it shows failure and lack of success, unfortunately. The interpretation of finding a missing person in a dream When you see in your dream that you found the person you are looking for, this is a good and praiseworthy interpretation, and it shows that you have overcome the most difficult stages or experiences. Where this indicates the return of the traveler or the newcomer and reconciliation between the spouses, and indicates the marriage of the unmarried or the end of her worries. The dream also indicates that the dreamer will experience a positive stage of stability and harmony that the dreamer sees as a result of his patience and unusual endurance. The interpretation of not finding a missing person in a dream As for those who see in their dream as if they are searching for someone, but do not find him until they wake up from their dream, this interpretation is considered a great moral loss. Perhaps the dream of being unable to find a missing person in a dream indicates this person's desire to stay away from the fortune teller, and perhaps the interpretation goes to the existence of deep differences between them, where the relationship between them becomes impossible and good in staying away or estrangement. The interpretation of searching for a lost lover in a dream If you see in a dream that you are searching for someone you love and did not find him in the dream, this means that the relationship between you has become impossible or requires you to make strong efforts to continue, and it is best when you see this dream, in order to review and re-evaluate yourself or evaluate the relationship as a whole, then determine whether the matter is worth it. The problem is that you continue or you have to give up the matter and forget it, so the fortune teller must be clear with himself, he is the only one who can evaluate this. The interpretation of seeing in my dream that someone was searching for me This dream is common, and most of those who see these dreams have a feeling of insecurity or lack of security, because this dream is also related to the dream of escape, hiding and hiding, as the dream reflects the dreamer's weakness in facing any kind-hearted person. If the person who is looking for you is close and familiar or there is affection between you, then know that you are enjoying his attention or care, but if he is a stranger or a policeman, then the dream indicates some difficulties that will disappear soon, but if the search continues and remains hidden in your sleep, then know that your escape and failure to face the problems will continue, and therefore these difficulties will worsen and you will not find a way to find a good solution in dealing with them, and to show courage, endurance and patience. The interpretation of the disappearance of a person in a dream The disappearance of a person in a dream indicates difficult circumstances that this person is facing, and the dream in this regard is a notification to the individual to take care of this person or take care of him. If one sees in a dream that he is reporting the disappearance of someone to the police or the public prosecutor's office, this means that the missing person is suffering from force majeure or an intractable situation and that the dreamer or the owner of the dream can help or assist him. He gets him out of a crisis. The interpretation of searching for something lost in a dream A person may see in his dream as if he had lost something precious or valuable, then he started looking for it. I am looking for a key, then I find it ...
